nodes.text: The Grandfather of Vice was a male individual who lived during the Galactic Civil War. In 3 ABY, when the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry took refuge on the planet Ankhural to repair its starships, the Grandfather of Vice helped the rebel company avoid trouble with the local gangs on the planet. One of the 61st's soldiers, Brand, soon inquired with a Weequay affiliated with the Grandfather of Vice about whether these gangs had any issues with the company. After the Weequay assured her that there was no trouble or inquiries from the gangs yet, Brand advised him to tell the Grandfather of Vice that she was grateful for his help.
The Grandfather of Vice was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
